newsitem.title: USA: Stiglitz says US economy should grow faster - RFTV.
newsitem.headline: Stiglitz says US economy should grow faster - RFTV.

text.p: Joseph Stiglitz, chairman of the White House Council of Economic Advisers, said Monday that he would like the U.S. economy to grow faster.
Interviewed on Reuters Financial Television, Stiglitz said "we think the economy should grow faster and have tried to put in place policies that will make the economy grow faster."
He said these policies included getting the deficit and interest rates down, which helps set the foundation for future growth of the economy.
